How about supporting agent-driven negotiation for browser-scenarios?

Subbu

On Dec 11, 2008, at 11:25 AM, Bill Burke wrote:

>
>
> Mark Baker wrote:
>> Use application/vnd.redhat.blahblah+xml. Registration of vendor tree
>> types is trivial.
>>
>
> Registration of vnd.redhat.blahblah will not allow Firefox and  
> Safari to
> render my documents though :)  I see your point of why namespaces  
> don't
> replace media types, but your example is an exception rather than the
> rule IME.  There's also no reason we couldn't use a different  
> identifier
> as a property name.
>
> -- 
> Bill Burke
> JBoss, a division of Red Hat
> http://bill.burkecentral.com
